Articles.Content:
Is there a way to edit your save to spawn a command pod on a planet and/or moon?

Thanks!

-Andrax314

I am looking at the persistent.sfs file and i would like the text/code for a mark1-2 cockpit on the kerbal equivalent of Saturn (the one with 7 or so moons).

Thanks!

-Andrax314

one of these variables controls witch body you are orbiting, but it's been a while since i have messed with it so i seem to forgot but im sure with i little tinkering you will figure it out in no time

Ps. if you change something that dose not correlate with anything else your game will crash
There is(was) a mod for that called hyperedit.
